Class SimpleFastItemIndex<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index.SimpleFastItemIndex<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, FastItemIndex<I>

    public class SimpleFastItemIndex<I>
extends Object
implements FastItemIndex<I>
    Simple implementation of FastItemIndex backed by a bi-map IdxIndex
